column4: can anyone give some directions...how can i change the following parts of ubuntu, the controls, the icons, the panel bars? I downloaded a theme from GTK2 but it doenst change everything...can anyone explain that for me, i am new to it
click customize on one of the themes in System/Preferences/Appearance and you can select those things
where can i download themes, with already icons, controls and panels. Because the screenshots of sites never matches what  i have .... i think that i am missing something
i cant for example change the main panels...why?
